property.name: fs.defaultFS
property.description:
Unique DAOS server URI which follows standard URI format, schema://ip:port. For now, ip and port are not actually used by DAOS to connect to DAOS server since DAOS uses shared file to connect to server. Instead ip and port here are used for representing pool uuid and container uuid on which DAOS FS mounted. To make it flexible, ip and port are not real pool uuid and container uuid, but keys which are mapped to real uuids. Here is the convention.
IP: default means value of "fs.daos.pool.uuid". pkey means value of "pkey.daos.pool.uuid".
Port: 0 means value of "fs.daos.container.uuid". ckey (positive integer) means value of "cckey.fs.daos.container.uuid". (additional c due to ckey is integer)
Other configuration (fs.daos.*) values will be read first from pkeycckey.fs.daos.* and fall back to default fs.daos.*.
For example, daos://default:0 uses default values of "fs.daos.pool.uuid" and "fs.daos.container.uuid". And read other default configurations. daos://pool1:1 uses values of "pool1.fs.daos.pool.uuid" and "c1.fs.daos.container.uuid". And try to read other configurations from pool1c1.fs.daos.* first and fall back to defaults.

property.name: fs.daos.container.uuid
property.description: UUID od DAOS container which created with "--type posix"

property.name: fs.daos.read.buffer.size
property.description: size of direct buffer for reading data from DAOS. Default is 8m. Value range is 1m - 2g.

property.name: fs.daos.write.buffer.size
property.description: size of direct buffer for writing data to DAOS. Default is 8m. Value range is 1m - 2g.

property.name: fs.daos.block.size
property.description: size for splitting large file into blocks when read by Hadoop. Default is 128m. Value range is 16m - 2m.

property.name: fs.daos.chunk.size
property.description: size of DAOS file chunk. Default is 1m. Value range is 4k - 2g.

property.name: fs.daos.preload.size
property.description: size for pre-loading more than requested data from DAOS into internal buffer when read. Value range is 1m - 2g.

property.name: fs.daos.io.bufferedReadEnabled
property.description: true for pre-loading more than requested data. false for loading exactly requested data.

property.name: c2.fs.daos.container.uuid
property.description: UUID od DAOS container which created with "--type posix"
